name: The Eternal Phone Booth
description:
After getting caught up in a very intriguing conversation with his friend that managed to last until the end of the world, our protagonist must investigate the remnants of this endless but somehow ended world.

Very much inspired by a few games.

Music:

"Robobozo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
